text: midneunjadeul-iyeo bunmyeonghan geos-eun mudjimalla haess-euni geugeos-i ohilyeo haelobge haneunila ttohan kkulan-i gye sidoeneun geos-eul mudneundamyeon ineun deoug neohuideul-ege haeag-ila geuleona hana nim-eun jinagan geos-eul yongseo hasini ha nanim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-i la
